p: Vector control activities have been carried out by using insecticides for adult mosquitoes knock-down (space spraying with pyrethrines) and residual insecticides for resting mosquitoes (etofenprox based products) applied on vegetation. Preventive blood safety measures were also introduced in the different areas following the spread of the infection. Given the large and populated area of Rome and the consequences of a interruption of blood donations on the regional blood supply, a risk-benefit evaluation based on daily epidemiological data was performed [ 33].
